setPhases

public static void setPhases(java.util.List<ValidObservation> obs,
                             double epoch,
                             double period)
Set the standard and previous cycle phases for each observation given the specified epoch and period.

Parameters:
obs - A list of valid observations.
epoch - An epoch (starting JD).
period - A period on which to base the phases.

calcStandardPhase

protected static double calcStandardPhase(double jd,
                                          double epoch,
                                          double period)
Calculate the standard phase, i.e. a phase value in the inclusive range 0..1.

Parameters:
jd - A Julian Date.
epoch - An epoch (starting JD).
period - A period on which to base the phases.
Returns:
The standard phase.
